Title: Kaththi
Writer: A.R. Murugadoss (dialogue), A.R. Murugadoss (screenplay), A.R. Murugadoss (story)
Actors: Joseph Vijay, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Neil Nitin Mukesh, Tota Roy Chowdhury
Plot: Jeevanandham is a social activist who fights against a monstrous MNC company to restore farming. Because of destiny, Kathiresan impersonates Jeevanandham and leads the war.
